
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/jiangyuhu/p/18643274" title="发布于 2024-12-31 10:06">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">使用Prism框架搭建Mvvm模式WPF程序</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>一、使用NuGet安装Prism框架</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1871582/202412/1871582-20241231085900235-660062589.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;二、构建ViewModel基类，注册导航器，弹窗服务，事件聚合器，多语言，log4net日志</p>
<p>1、新建ViewModelBase基类，继承自BindableBase, INavigationAware, IRegionMemberLifetime, IConfirmNavigationRequest构建ViewModel的通用方法，其他页面的ViewModel类均继承该基类即可。</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">abstract</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ViewModelBase : BindableBase, INavigationAware, IRegionMemberLifetime, IConfirmNavigationRequest
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">{

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>2、增加多语言服务，在ViewModel基类中注册使用</p>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;新增多语言接口ILanguage　　&nbsp;</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_ec6e4bbf-493b-4ffd-aa9b-80a0e891ca10" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_ec6e4bbf-493b-4ffd-aa9b-80a0e891ca10" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">
<div id="cnblogs_code_open_ec6e4bbf-493b-4ffd-aa9b-80a0e891ca10" class="cnblogs_code_hide">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span>   <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">interface</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ILanguage
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 查找当前字典中翻译文字
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;param name="key"&gt;&lt;/param&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;returns&gt;&lt;/returns&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span>       <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">object</span> GetValue(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">string</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> key);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">10</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 根据Key在当前程序中查找翻译文件
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;param name="key"&gt;&lt;/param&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">13</span>       <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span> LoadResourceKey(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">string</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> key);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">15</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 根据路径加载翻译文件
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;param name="path"&gt;&lt;/param&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span>       <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span> LoadPath(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">string</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> path);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 加载翻译文件
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;param name="languageDictionary"&gt;&lt;/param&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span>       <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LoadDictionary(ResourceDictionary languageDictionary);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 刷新视图翻译效果
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span>       <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span>       <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Refresh();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">28</span>   }</pre>
</div>
<span class="cnblogs_code_collapse">View Code</span></div>
<p>　　新增多语言扩展类LanguageExtension，继承MarkupExtension类（using System.Windows.Markup;）封装实现获取多语言信息的静态方法</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_5b34a82f-8bee-466c-8149-d591ef33a8c9" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_5b34a82f-8bee-466c-8149-d591ef33a8c9" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">
<div id="cnblogs_code_open_5b34a82f-8bee-466c-8149-d591ef33a8c9" class="cnblogs_code_hide">

<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">265</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">static</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">bool</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> AddApplicationResourcesLanguage()

<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">268</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">269</span>             Window window = Application.Current?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.MainWindow;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">270</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (window != <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">null</span> &amp;&amp; !DesignerProperties.GetIsInDesignMode((DependencyObject)(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">object</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)window))
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">271</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">272</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (localSource == <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">null</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">273</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">                {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">274</span>                     localSource =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> source;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">275</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">                }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">276</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">277</span>                 ResourceDictionary resourceDictionary = Application.Current.Resources?.MergedDictionaries?.Where((ResourceDictionary o) =&gt; o.Source == localSource.Source)?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.FirstOrDefault();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">278</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (resourceDictionary != <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">null</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">279</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">                {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">280</span>                     Application.Current.Resources?.MergedDictionaries?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.Remove(resourceDictionary);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">281</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">                }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">282</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">283</span>                 Application.Current.Resources?.MergedDictionaries?<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.Add(Source);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">284</span>                 localSource =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Source;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">285</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">286</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">287</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">288</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">289</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">catch</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">290</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">291</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">292</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">293</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">294</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">295</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">296</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> MultiBinding CreateBinding(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">object</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> key)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">297</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">298</span>         MultiBinding multiBinding = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> MultiBinding();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">299</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (key <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">is</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Binding binding)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">300</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">301</span>             multiBinding.ConverterParameter =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> binding.Path.Path;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">302</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            multiBinding.Bindings.Add(binding);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">303</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">304</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">305</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">306</span>             multiBinding.ConverterParameter =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> key;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">307</span>             multiBinding.Bindings.Add(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Binding
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">308</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">309</span>                 Source =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> key,
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">310</span>                 Mode =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> BindingMode.OneWay
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">311</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            });
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">312</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">313</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">314</span>         multiBinding.Bindings.Add(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Binding
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">315</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">316</span>             Source =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Source,
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">317</span>             Mode =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> BindingMode.OneWay
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">318</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        });
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">319</span>         multiBinding.Converter = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LanguageConverter();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">320</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> multiBinding;

<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 新增类Language，实现接口ILanguage，调用扩展类LanguageExtension中的静态方法，实现多语言信息的载入和自动翻译</p>

<p>　3.增加log4net日志服务，在ViewModel基类中注册使用</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;三、增加WPF应用程序</p>
<p>　　1.修改App.xaml文件，修改页面使用prism:PrismApplication，修改后台代码继承PrismApplication实现配置信息的初始化，自定义接口的注入，页面模块的注入等功能</p>
<p>　　　　App.xaml页面文件　　　　　　</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　　　　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_494456a4-c962-4c02-9aa2-73f98f574e01" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_494456a4-c962-4c02-9aa2-73f98f574e01" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">
<div id="cnblogs_code_open_494456a4-c962-4c02-9aa2-73f98f574e01" class="cnblogs_code_hide">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> &lt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">prism:PrismApplication
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span>     x:Class=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">UIApp.App</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 3</span>     xmlns=<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>

<p>　　</p>
<p>　　2.编写LoginWinViewModel继承ViewModelBase基类，实现用户登录用户名密码的校验和跳转主窗口MainWindow</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_6ef54a6d-9f8b-484f-aa68-5c966a640779" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_6ef54a6d-9f8b-484f-aa68-5c966a640779" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">
<div id="cnblogs_code_open_6ef54a6d-9f8b-484f-aa68-5c966a640779" class="cnblogs_code_hide">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LoginWinViewModel : ViewModelBase
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">{

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 4</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 5</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">readonly</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> IRegionManager _regionManager;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 6</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LoginWinViewModel(IContainerExtension container, IRegionManager regionManager)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span>

<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> DelegateCommand LoginCommand { <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">get</span>; <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">set</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">; }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ExcuteLoginCommand()
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">19</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">string</span>.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(UserName) || <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">string</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(PassWord))
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">21</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">22</span>             LayMessage.Error(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">请输入用户名和密码！！</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Message</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">23</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">24</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">25</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">26</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> main =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Application.Current.MainWindow;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">27</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> window = _container.Resolve&lt;MainWindow&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">28</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        RegionManager.SetRegionManager(window,_regionManager);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">29</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        window.Show();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">30</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        main.Close();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">31</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">32</span>

</div>
<span class="cnblogs_code_collapse">View Code</span></div>
<p>　　</p>
<p>　　3.多语言文件en_US.xaml的模板格式，添加节点信息即可</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_11d078a0-b2c2-4f40-a7f6-a921a3973e11" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_11d078a0-b2c2-4f40-a7f6-a921a3973e11" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">

</div>
<span class="cnblogs_code_collapse">View Code</span></div>
<p>　　</p>
<p>　　4.编写MainWindowViewModel，实现主窗体属性和命令的绑定</p>

<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 53</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">string</span> _Message = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">""</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;

</div>
<span class="cnblogs_code_collapse">View Code</span></div>
<p>　　MainWindow.xaml页面文件的实现</p>
<p>　　&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;通过代码&lt;ContentControl prismRegions:RegionManager.RegionName="{x:Static Nv:SystemResource.Nav_MainContent}" /&gt;实现菜单页面Home.xaml的注入</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　　　　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_33e27062-5746-4ae1-9a8e-641df914badb" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_33e27062-5746-4ae1-9a8e-641df914badb" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">

<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">403</span>                                     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">EasingDoubleKeyFrame </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">KeyTime</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="0:0:0.5"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> Value</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="0.5"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">404</span>                                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">405</span>                             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Storyboard</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">406</span>                         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Lay:LayNoticeBar.Resources</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>四、增加Home项目，封装实现主窗口的菜单页面</p>
<p>　　1.编写类HomeModule，实现首页模块注册。将Home页面注入到SystemResource.Nav_MainContent中　</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_eb74e677-8125-4e38-8b2e-75b86fc365db" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_eb74e677-8125-4e38-8b2e-75b86fc365db" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">

<p>　　</p>
<p>　　2.编写菜单栏模型类MenuItemModel，为实现数据的双向绑定，继承Prism中的基类BindableBase</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_144d7b26-265a-475b-8ce8-c1b7a4cc15c5" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_144d7b26-265a-475b-8ce8-c1b7a4cc15c5" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">48</span>         <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">51</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">54</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">55</span>

</div>
<span class="cnblogs_code_collapse">View Code</span></div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>　　3.编写菜单栏模板选择器MenuItemDataTemplateSelector，继承DataTemplateSelector（using System.Windows.Controls;）</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_26ccffe4-e590-4878-bba5-d9695f44329f" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_26ccffe4-e590-4878-bba5-d9695f44329f" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">

<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 1</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 2</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 菜单栏模板选择器

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 7</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 8</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (item != <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">null</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 9</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            {

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">11</span>                 MenuItemModel menuItem = item <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">as</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> MenuItemModel;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">12</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (menuItem.Data != <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">null</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">14</span>

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">16</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">                }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">17</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">18</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">                {

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">20</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">                }

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 49</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>

<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 52</span>         _GoPageCommand ?? (_GoPageCommand = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span> DelegateCommand&lt;MenuItemModel&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">(GoPage));
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 53</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 54</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">#endregion</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 55</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 56</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">#region</span> 核心方法
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 57</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 58</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 跳转界面
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 59</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 60</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;param name="PageKey"&gt;&lt;/param&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 61</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> GoPage(MenuItemModel item)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 62</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 63</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (item == <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">null</span>) <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 64</span>         MenuItemModel =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> item;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 65</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 66</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">#endregion</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 67</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">async</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">override</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ExecuteLoadedCommand()
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 68</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 69</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">IsAvailable = NetworkHelper.GetLocalNetworkStatus();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 70</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">NetworkHelper.NetworkAvailabilityChanged += Network_NetworkAvailabilityChanged;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 71</span>         MenuItemList = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">await</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> GetData();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 72</span>         MenuItemModel =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> MenuItemList.First().Data.First();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 73</span>         MenuItemList.First().IsSelected = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 74</span>         MenuItemModel.IsSelected = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 75</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">LayMessage.Success("欢迎使用Layui—WPF组件库", "RootMessageTooken");</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 76</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 77</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 78</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">bool</span> IsAvailable = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 79</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span> Network_NetworkAvailabilityChanged(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">bool</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> isAvailable)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 80</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 81</span>         Network =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> isAvailable;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 82</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (!IsAvailable &amp;&amp; Network == <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 83</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 84</span>             Application.Current.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span> Action(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">async</span> () =&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 85</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 86</span>                 MenuItemList = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">await</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> GetData();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 87</span>                 MenuItemModel =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> MenuItemList.First().Data.First();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 88</span>                 MenuItemList.First().IsSelected = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 89</span>                 MenuItemModel.IsSelected = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 90</span>                 LayMessage.Success(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">网络已恢复</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">RootMessageTooken</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 91</span>                 LayMessage.Success(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">程序已重新加载</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">RootMessageTooken</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 94</span>         IsAvailable =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Network;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 95</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }

<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">309</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Task.FromResult(list);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">310</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">311</span> }</pre>
</div>
<span class="cnblogs_code_collapse">View Code</span></div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>　　5.Home.xaml页面代码</p>
<p>　　　　通过&nbsp;&lt;ContentControl prismRegions:RegionManager.RegionName="{x:Static Nv:SystemResource.Nav_HomeContent}" /&gt;实现菜单子页面的注入和跳转</p>
<p>　　　　通过ScrollViewer主键实现菜单页面，</p>
<p>　　　　&lt;ItemsControl</p>
<p><em id="__mceDel">     　　　　　　Padding="0"<br>     　　　　　　Background="Transparent"<br>     　　　　　　BorderThickness="0"<br>     　　　　　　ItemTemplateSelector="{DynamicResource MenuItemSelector}"<br>     　　　　　　ItemsSource="{Binding MenuItemList}"&gt;　　</em></p>
<p><em>　　　　ItemsControl组件实现菜单项的绑定<em>MenuItemList，<em>ItemTemplateSelector属性实现菜单项的选择切换，DataTemplate属性实现页面的跳转</em></em></em></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　　　　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_b906dd23-f787-45fb-9483-e33135d84349" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_b906dd23-f787-45fb-9483-e33135d84349" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">
<div id="cnblogs_code_open_b906dd23-f787-45fb-9483-e33135d84349" class="cnblogs_code_hide">

<span class="cnblogs_code_collapse">View Code</span></div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>五、添加其他模块的项目，并实现主菜单中选择页面的跳转</p>
<p>　　需在App.xaml的后台代码重写方法ConfigureModuleCatalog中进行模块的注入：&nbsp; moduleCatalog.AddModule&lt;SystemConfigModule&gt;();</p>
<p>　　1.编写模块类SystemConfigModule继承IModule接口，实现RegisterTypes方法，继续页面跳转的注册</p>
<p>　　　　containerRegistry.RegisterForNavigation&lt;Views.SysUserInfos&gt;("SysUserInfos");</p>

<div id="cnblogs_code_open_83d3803d-6d66-40e5-9c22-27c2479777cc" class="cnblogs_code_hide">

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp; &nbsp; 2.编写ViewModel类实现页面的绑定和命令实现</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">　　<img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ContractedBlock.gif" id="code_img_closed_014b2564-448d-4f1b-8c75-4a6caa102936" class="code_img_closed"><img src="https://images.cnblogs.com/OutliningIndicators/ExpandedBlockStart.gif" id="code_img_opened_014b2564-448d-4f1b-8c75-4a6caa102936" class="code_img_opened" style="display: none">

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 10</span>         LoadedListData(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span> LayPagination { JumpIndex = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>,Limit = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">10</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">});
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 11</span>         ClickCommand = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> DelegateCommand(ExcuteClickCommand);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 12</span>         PageUpdatedCommand = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span> DelegateCommand&lt;LayPagination&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">(LoadedListData);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 13</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 14</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 15</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">#region</span> 查询命令
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 16</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">查询命令</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 17</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> DelegateCommand ClickCommand { <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">get</span>; <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">set</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">; }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 18</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 19</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ExcuteClickCommand()
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 20</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 21</span>         LayDialogParameter dialogParameter = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LayDialogParameter();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 22</span>         dialogParameter.Add(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Message</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">""</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 23</span>         LayDialog.ShowDialog(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">DialogAlert</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span>, dialogParameter, rest =&gt;
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 24</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 25</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">switch</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> (rest.Result)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 26</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 27</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">case</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LayUI.Wpf.Enum.ButtonResult.Yes:
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 28</span>                     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">break</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 29</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">case</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LayUI.Wpf.Enum.ButtonResult.No:
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 30</span>                     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">break</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 31</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">case</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LayUI.Wpf.Enum.ButtonResult.Default:
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 32</span>                     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">break</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 33</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">default</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">:
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 34</span>                     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">break</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 35</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 36</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 37</span>         }, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">Dialog</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 38</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 39</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">#endregion</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 40</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 41</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">#region</span> 页面更新
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 42</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> DelegateCommand&lt;LayPagination&gt; PageUpdatedCommand { <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">get</span>; <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">set</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">; }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 43</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 44</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">void</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> LoadedListData(LayPagination pagination)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 45</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 46</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">try</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 47</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 48</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> random = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Random();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 49</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 50</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> list = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span> List&lt;UserInfo&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 51</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            list.Clear();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 52</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">for</span> (<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> i = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>; i &lt; <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">16000</span>; i++<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 53</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 54</span>                 <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">int</span> num = random.Next(<span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>, <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">101</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 55</span>                 list.Add(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span> UserInfo() { Index = i, Name = <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">测试</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">"</span> + i, ProgressBarValue =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> num });
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 56</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            };
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 57</span>             Total =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> list.Count();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 58</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> temp = list.Skip((pagination.JumpIndex - <span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 128, 1)">1</span>) *<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> pagination.Limit).Take(pagination.Limit).ToList();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 59</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            ListData.Clear();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 60</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">foreach</span> (<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">var</span> item <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">in</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> temp)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 61</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 62</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">                ListData.Add(item);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 63</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">            }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 64</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 65</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 66</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">catch</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> (Exception ex)
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 67</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 68</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 69</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">throw</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ex;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 70</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 71</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 72</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">#endregion</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 73</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 74</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">#region</span> 页面属性
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 75</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 76</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 77</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 78</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> ObservableCollection&lt;UserInfo&gt; _ListData = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">new</span> ObservableCollection&lt;UserInfo&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">();
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 79</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> ObservableCollection&lt;UserInfo&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ListData
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 80</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 81</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">get</span> { <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> _ListData; }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 82</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">set</span> { SetProperty(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">ref</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> _ListData, value); }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 83</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 84</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 85</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 86</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 控制当前的列展示状态
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 87</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 88</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Visibility _Visibility;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 89</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Visibility Visibility
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 90</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 91</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">get</span> { <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> _Visibility; }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 92</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">set</span> { SetProperty(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">ref</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> _Visibility, value); }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 93</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 94</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 95</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 96</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 97</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 98</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">bool</span> _IsShow = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)"> 99</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">public</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">bool</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> IsShow
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">100</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">101</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">get</span> { <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> _IsShow; }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">102</span>         <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">set</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">103</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        {
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">104</span>             SetProperty(<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">ref</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> _IsShow, value);
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">105</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span> (value) Visibility =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Visibility.Visible;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">106</span>             <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">else</span> Visibility =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> Visibility.Collapsed;
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">107</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">        }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">108</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">    }
</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">109</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">110</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">111</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> 
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">112</span>     <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">///</span> <span style="color: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)">&lt;/summary&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 128, 1)">113</span>     <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">private</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">bool</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> _IsActive;
